full_summary:
# RFP: TSPS Evaluation Services Consultants/Experts

## RFP Title and Solicitation Number

* Title (English): TSPS Evaluation Services Consultants/Experts
* Title (French): Experts-conseillers en services d'évaluation/Spécialistes en la matière
* Solicitation Number: J064328

## Contract Details

* Reference Number: PW-23-01030799
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: March 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: April 27, 2023, at 02:00 PM Eastern Time
* Amendment Date: April 18, 2023

## Contract Duration and Delivery

* Estimated contract duration: March 31, 2024
* Delivery timeframe: Task authorizations

## Tender Type and Method

* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tender Method: Competitive - Limited Tendering

## Eligibility and Participation

* This requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have a Tier 1 qualification in the following categories:
    * 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant – Senior
    * 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant – Intermediate
    * 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant – Junior
    * 2.14 Subject Matter Expert - Senior

## Trade Agreements

* This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
    * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Statistics Canada
* Address: 150 Tunney's Pasture Driveway, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0T6, Canada
* Contact: Peters, Michael, statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca

## Additional Information

* The attached notice of proposed procurement provides more details.
* The estimated quantity of commodity is 170 days.
